TopicTitle: A ship connected to another ship disappears in game and VAB

Articles.Content: If I attach a ship to another ship with the small hardpoint it seems to work fine at first.  However upon loading into the game this attached ship will have partially disappeared.  Also when loading back into the VAB these removed pieces are gone forever.  The workaround is to make the probe core of the attached vehicle the assembly anchor for the entire structure.  This may mean that "control from here" is needed to get control back to the main cockpit also.
